rules.description: SpaceFN: Space+[esdf] to Up, Left, Down, Right
SpaceFN: Space+Backquote(`)/z to Escape, Space+[1-9] to F[1-9], Space+0 to F10, Space+Hyphen (-) to F11, Space+Equal Sign (=) to F12
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
right_control+>return_or_enter; left_control +> 'Hyper Key' delete_or_backspace; left_option+>up_arrow; left_command+>down_arrow;
为了MBP15内置键盘 spacebar模式 Fn+F11->volume_decrement, Fn+F12->volume_increment不好使做的补全措施
远程连接客户端 Swap command and control
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
